alert.note: Alert for Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 9:50PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Ada, southern Payette, Canyon, northwestern Owyhee and northeastern Malheur Counties through 1130 PM MDT... At 1050 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Homedale to Givens Hot Springs to near Reynolds. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Nampa, Caldwell, Homedale and Wilder around 1100 PM MDT. Greenleaf and Notus around 1110 PM MDT. Sand Hollow around 1120 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
